short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutes the player when ads are playing and skips them when possible. (Twitch, YouTube)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension mutes the player while ads are playing on Twitch and YouTube.
Ads on YouTube will be skipped automatically when the skip button appears.
